Name: Find Objects
About the game: Are you ready to test your eyes with Find Objects, Your seek and find skills will be challenged like never before. Develops your secret seeker skill to find objects. This is a puzzle game similar to Hidden Object games, in which you have to find the objects while the clock is ticking. Find Objects is not only a visually satisfying but also mentally and entertaining experience after hours of stressful work. If you are looking for a game to test your talent and practice your ability to observe. This is a game for all ages. Children can play to improve their attention capacity and visual ability. Elderly people also can play as an attention and concentration practice. Everyone will have a great time, no matter your age!. Features: - 3 Game Modes: Easy, Normal, Hard - 400 Beautiful icons to find - Play a cool and relaxed match - Boost your brainpower and discernment
